title: Gifting Center
body: So I can buy items with RP when I am banned but I cant gift my friends with my RP.  That's honestly disgusting and shows where Riots priorities are, and I want help to either transfer the RP to another account, or have the ability to gift me friends so they don't have to wait....  The fact that I cant talk to my friends because I'm banned is r%%%%%ed in itself.  I'm already banned from playing, now restrict my friends as well.  And restrict gifting too?  It's a load of bull.

replies.body: The main reason as to why you [**can't send gifts from a banned or suspended account**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964) is due to the fact that the ban that's been put in place needs to hold it's weight. Without these precautions, there would be too many ways for players to cheat the system.
